hero.title: Discover Mato Grosso do Sul
hero.subtitle: From Pantanal to Cerrado, explore unique landscapes and biodiversity in the heart of South America

home.title: Discover Mato Grosso do Sul
home.subtitle: Explore amazing destinations, create unique routes and live unforgettable experiences

tourismDescription.title: Discover Mato Grosso do Sul – Live this experience!
tourismDescription.paragraph1: Get ready to discover the best of MS in an innovative and smart way. With the help of Guatá, your virtual guide inspired by local culture, you'll explore attractions like Bonito, Pantanal, Serra da Bodoquena and much more!
tourismDescription.paragraph2: Create your digital passport, unlock thematic stamps with Cerrado and Pantanal animals, participate in interactive routes, receive rewards and live unforgettable moments! Sign up to explore more and help improve local tourism!

highlights.title: Tourist Regions
highlights.description: Discover the main tourist regions of Mato Grosso do Sul, each with its unique identity and special attractions

experiences.title: Complete Experiences
experiences.subtitle: Discover everything Mato Grosso do Sul has to offer with unique and unforgettable experiences

2.title: Event Calendar

cats.description: CATs are support points where you can find information and guidance to make the most of your experience in Mato Grosso do Sul
